Created an attachment (id=72861)
The file causes the exception

The inline schema validator seems to be misbehaving when invoked in the WS-I WSDL validator context.

Changing the inline schema to look like this should avoid the issue

<schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/stockquote.xsd"             xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
